in the linux world... no ones opinion but your own matters on whats best. You've entered a gateway to liberal software, freedom of customization, and a world of amazement. You are your own leader in a game of constructing a system around who you are. Don't ask people whats best, as we'll all see differently. Instead, play, experiment, and grow... Make linux work for YOU, not you work for it! Enjoy it, experiment, and learn to love it.
